turns.speaker: agent

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. Having documentation of your report and a contract are helpful. turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Given your situation, here's a general overview of what you should do next, which is not legal advice and for informational purposes only: 1.
